title: Roglič vs. Remco: Race for the Tour de France Starts at Critérium du Dauphiné
content:
Both Evenepoel and Roglič — who've only raced 18 and 12 days, respectively, so far in 2024 — are emphasizing progress over results this week at the Dauphiné.

Read the full article at Roglič vs. Remco: Race for the Tour de France Starts at Critérium du Dauphiné on Velo.
author: ahood
